name.en: Chair of International Business and Innovation

structural_unit_name.en: Chair of International Business and Innovation

description.en: The course provides versatile basic knowledge about innovations, innovation problems and diffusion of innovative thinking on the company, country and global level from the perspectives of economics and business administration.
description.et: Kursus pakub mitmekesiseid alusteadmiseid innovatsioonide, innovatsiooniprobleemide ja innovaatilise mõtlemise leviku kohta ettevõtte, riigi ning globaalsel tasandil nii majandusteoreetilisest kui ettevõttemajanduslikust vaatenurgast.

objectives.en: The purpose of this course is to create opportunities for acquiring the basic body of knowledge as well as skills about relevant analytical tools and methods concerning innovation on the level of economic systems as well as in an organization (company).
objectives.et: Aine eesmärgiks on luua võimalused innovatsiooni valdkonna põhiteadmiste ning analüüsivõtete ja meetodite omandamiseks nii majandussüsteemi kui organisatsiooni (ettevõtte) tasandil.

learning_outcomes.en: a) knows the main concepts of innovations;
b) understands the theoretical and practical questions of innovations;
learning_outcomes.et: b) Mõistab innovatsiooni teoreetilisi ja praktilisi küsimusi

learning_outcomes.en: c) knows how to relate innovation with other fields of economics and business administration;
learning_outcomes.et: c) Teab, kuidas seostada innovatsiooni majandusteooria ja ettevõttemajanduse teiste valdkondadega

learning_outcomes.en: d) can evaluate which factors should be taken into account while generating innovative thinking in the company;
learning_outcomes.et: d) Oskab hinnata milliseid tegureid tuleb arvestada innovaatilise mõtteviisi kujundamisel ettevõttes.

learning_outcomes.en: g) has acquired skills for the holistic analysis of innovations;
learning_outcomes.et: e) On omandanud oskused innovatsiooni terviklikuks analüüsiks

learning_outcomes.en: h) has obtained positive attitudes towards acceptance of versatile and novel perspectives in a company;
learning_outcomes.et: f) On omandanud positiivsed hoiakud mitmekülgsete ja uudsete vaatepunktide aktsepteerimiseks ettevõttes

learning_outcomes.en: i) is familiar with the main innovation problems in Estonian organizations and in a global context.
learning_outcomes.et: g) Tunneb innovatsiooniga seotud põhiprobleeme Eesti organisatsioonides ja ka globaalses kontekstis

independent_work.et: Homework in groups, instructions in the Moodle.

description.et: We will have ONE class test in Moodle. The test will be based on the topic covered for that particular day and the previous lectures. The students will be informed of the day the test will take place. The test will take place in Moodle. The test is compulsory so when you have been informed of the date for the test, Kindly make time to do it Moodle.

grade_preconditions.et: Submitting homework by 29.03.2024  23:55 in the Moodle.

grade_evaluation.et:
60% and above of the points is required for passing the course.
The points will be assigned as follows:
Max 30% homework (in groups)
one class test (20%)
Max 50% written test on 5.04.2024

debt_elimination.et:
Written homework needs to be submitted in time!
The second test will be organized for students who fail to make at least 60 %.
